column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Arko - Thanks for your review. I'd appreciate additional feedback if you'd be willing to offer it
column2: especially in regards to our ramen. We feel like we offer a quality product
column3: and we work hard to maintain consistency across all of our locations. If there was something in particular you found unappealing
column4: it would help us immensely to know. Regardless
